title: SET_VEHICLE_GEAR_RATIO
content:
0x496EF2F2// SetVehicleGearRatio
void SET_VEHICLE_GEAR_RATIO(Vehicle vehicle, int gear, float ratio);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.gear: The vehicles gear you want to change.ratio: The gear ratio you want to use.Sets the vehicles gear ratio on choosen gear, reverse gear needs to be a negative float and forward moving gear needs to be a positive float. Refer to the examples if confused.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#local function Set8SpeedVehicleGears(Vehicle)
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 0, -3.32)  -- reverse gear at -3.21:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 1, 4.71)   -- 1st gear at 4.71:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 2, 3.14)   -- 2nd gear at 3.14:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 3, 2.11)   -- 3rd gear at 2.11:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 4, 1.67)   -- 4th gear at 1.67:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 5, 1.29)   -- 5th gear at 1.29:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 6, 1.0)    -- 6th gear at 1.0:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 7, 0.84)   -- 7th gear at 0.84:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 8, 0.67)   -- 8th gear at 0.67:1
end
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleGearRatio
void SET_VEHICLE_GEAR_RATIO(Vehicle vehicle, int gear, float ratio);

local function Set8SpeedVehicleGears(Vehicle)
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 0, -3.32)  -- reverse gear at -3.21:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 1, 4.71)   -- 1st gear at 4.71:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 2, 3.14)   -- 2nd gear at 3.14:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 3, 2.11)   -- 3rd gear at 2.11:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 4, 1.67)   -- 4th gear at 1.67:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 5, 1.29)   -- 5th gear at 1.29:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 6, 1.0)    -- 6th gear at 1.0:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 7, 0.84)   -- 7th gear at 0.84:1
    SetVehicleGearRatio(Vehicle, 8, 0.67)   -- 8th gear at 0.67:1
end

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_GEAR_RATIO
SetVehicleGearRatio(vehicle, 0, 0.0)
